title: Keycard is stuck on [Hold the card] screen once user performs Reset the card action and tries to recover
body:
# Problem

After [reset card] option for keycard was performed -> user lands on the login screen. Card is reset , no accounts in status.

If i tap recover access -> recover with keycard -> then no matter how many times i tap the card to the phone, screens are not changing. In logs you can see that card is detected.

Restarting the app does not help.

![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/28752642/63004548-548c8800-be83-11e9-8cb8-3dd278c39d32.png)

## Steps

1. use blue card
2. create new keycard account from scratch and save pairing code and recovery phrase somewhere
3. tap options -> keycard -> reset keycard -> confirm
4. on login screen select Recover access
5. select Recover with keycard
6. tap the reseted card to the phone
